Helping you stay strong

During COVID-19 we're here to help keep your employees, customers, and business on track in a work-anywhere world

Virtual Connection Program

Industry

Design solutions from the user's perspective that promote engagement throughout the entire customer journey

Experience

Design solutions from the user's perspective that promote engagement throughout the entire customer journey

Level 3 Heading

Level 3 Subheading

BEFORE Transforming Experience

Due to an inconsistent overall customer experience, they often lose customers, who perceive their product or service as unsatisfying. For fear of this turnover, internal teams face immense pressure to develop highly custom end user experiences. This causes a rift between development and design, ultimately hindering deployment. As a result, companies fail to go to market in time and fall far behind their customer-centric peers.

Built for Purpose

Hitachi Solutions empowers organizations everywhere to be better every day. We enable technology for people, not simply processes. Our clients are on an accelerated journey to differentiate themselves through innovation—from the technology they use, to the products and services they sell, to the feedback loop for continuous improvement. We know that our clients’ employees, end customers, and channel partners expect the same streamlined experience they get from dozens of consumer applications on a daily basis—why shouldn’t their work experience be just as positive?

What is the Experience Track?

In today’s fast-paced digital ecosystem, companies are facing scaling challenges to deliver better products or services, faster, while maintaining a cohesive customer experience. We can help you leverage the power of design systems and engagement tools to differentiate yourself among your target audiences and focus on what makes your business unique.

Our user-centric experience design will set your company up for long-term success, minimize design churn, and create brand consistency with an iterative design approach. Engage with your customers through professional applications and gain better visibility into the entire customer experience so you can drive consistent improvement in everyday processes.

What to look our for...

Do you struggle to understand your customers: who they are, what challenges they face, and what features of your product or service they prefer?

Do you struggle to understand your customers: who they are, what challenges they face, and what features of your product or service they prefer?

Feature Functionality

There are six major components that make up digital transformation as we know it today: Information, Experience, Infrastructure Modernization, Operational Excellence, Collaboration, and Innovation. We’ll help you decipher each as it relates to your unique business needs and bring you one step closer to true transformation.

Top Insurance Business Challenges

Delivering a personalized policy holder experience
Scenario #1

Meet Robert, he is a broker struggling with customer loyalty in a competitive market known for churn. With the rise of digital technology, his customers now expect end-to-end personalized experiences focused on their convenience.

Our Solution
